verses.verse: A Psalm of David, when he was in the wilderness of Judah. O God <S%H430><s%>, thou art my God <S%H410><s%>; earnestly will I seek <S%H7836><s%> thee <S%H5315><s%>: My soul thirsteth <S%H6770><s%> for thee <S%H1320><s%>, my flesh longeth <S%H3642><s%> for thee <S%H6723><s%>, In a dry and weary <S%H5889><s%> land <S%H776><s%>, where no <S%H1097><s%> water is <S%H4325><s%>.
So have I looked <S%H2372><s%> upon thee in the sanctuary <S%H6944><s%>, To see <S%H7200><s%> thy power <S%H5797><s%> and thy glory <S%H3519><s%>.
Because thy lovingkindness <S%H2617><s%> is better <S%H2896><s%> than life <S%H2416><s%>, My lips <S%H8193><s%> shall praise thee <S%H7623><s%>.
So will I bless <S%H1288><s%> thee while I live <S%H2416><s%>: I will lift up <S%H5375><s%> my hands <S%H3709><s%> in thy name <S%H8034><s%>.

My soul <S%H5315><s%> shall be satisfied <S%H7646><s%> as with marrow <S%H2459><s%> and fatness <S%H1880><s%>; And my mouth <S%H6310><s%> shall praise <S%H1984><s%> thee with joyful <S%H7445><s%> lips <S%H8193><s%>;
When I remember <S%H2142><s%> thee upon my bed <S%H3326><s%>, And meditate <S%H1897><s%> on thee in the night-watches <S%H821><s%>.
For thou hast been my help <S%H5833><s%>, And in the shadow <S%H6738><s%> of thy wings <S%H3671><s%> will I rejoice <S%H7442><s%>.
My soul <S%H5315><s%> followeth hard <S%H1692><s%> after <S%H310><s%> thee <S%H3225><s%>: Thy right hand upholdeth me <S%H8551><s%>.
But those that seek <S%H1245><s%> my soul <S%H5315><s%>, to destroy <S%H7722><s%> it <S%H935><s%>, Shall go into the lower parts <S%H8482><s%> of the earth <S%H776><s%>.
They shall be given over <S%H5064><s%> to the power of the sword <S%H3027><s%>: They shall be a portion <S%H4521><s%> for foxes <S%H7776><s%>.

But the king <S%H4428><s%> shall rejoice <S%H8055><s%> in God <S%H430><s%>: Every one that sweareth <S%H7650><s%> by him shall glory <S%H1984><s%>; For the mouth <S%H6310><s%> of them that speak <S%H1696><s%> lies <S%H8267><s%> shall be stopped <S%H5534><s%>.
